problem_text:
Let Aut Fn be the automorphism group of a free group of rank n with norm
|| · || as in 14.23.
Does there exist a recursive function f : N × N →N with the
following property: for any two conjugate elements α, β ∈Aut Fn there is an element
γ ∈Aut Fn such that γ−1αγ = β and ||γ|| ⩽f(||α||, ||β||)?
O. V. Bogopolski
